transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir
Executive: Sir, aap kaise ho? Kya chal raha hai? Namaste. Good, good sir.
Customer: Sir, abhi sir aapne ye video meeting ka request kiya hai IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan, to main aapko invite bhej raha hu, join kariye bataiye.
Customer: Haan, kuch, kuch issue aa raha hai sir?
Executive: Nahi, it is you mentioned there some two people are interested with you, if you are interested we will arrange video call. I said okay.
Customer: Nahi nahi, kya, kya likha aa raha hai?
Executive: Usme aapne IndiaMART me likha hua hai, if interested two people are interested to talk to you. If you are interested we arrange video call meeting.
Executive: Accha, wo account person ke regarding aata hai ki agar aap apne account person se video meeting karna chahte hai to aap ispe click kare.
Customer: Accha, theek hai, chhod dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan, to bataiye bhi kya kuch dikkat aa rahi hai? Kyuki aapne wo request kiya to hamare paas concern raise ho jata hai na video meeting ka.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi, accha us time ke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi budget vagarah abhi consume nahi kar rahe hai kya sir abhi? Kyuki last time aapse baat hua tha na 7th October ko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hmm hmm, to aapki do teen query aayi thi, maine aapko bataya tha, baat ho gayi thi sir usse?
Customer: Nahi, wo paanch paanch tons ka, do do tons ka aisa aa raha hai, to fir wo kya fayda hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi, to inquiry aayi thi, direct query aayi thi, maine aapko bataya tha na.
Customer: Haan bataya tha, wo kam kar rahi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Wo nahi tha aur abhi dekhiye call ka bhi aapka flow badh gaya sir, apne paas call bhi jyada aane lage hai buyer se.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Accha, kisko?
Executive: Direct call, buyer ki direct call aapke paas aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hmm hmm, to call pe aapki baat ho rahi hai na buyer ke sath?
Customer: Haan ho rahe.
Executive: Hmm hmm, to usme abhi koi deal bana sir aapka?
Customer: Nahi, wahi to wo log sabhi traders hai, hamare jaise traders hi hai wo.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Accha, accha sir, jaise, haan jaise Innovate tab, jaise abhi ek recent me hai 18 November ko Ranchi se, bed from mattress wo chahiye 4 inch me.
Customer: Haan, kya hua sir, 4 inch?
Executive: Main keh raha hu 18, 18 November ko aapke paas ek query aayi hai Ranchi.
Customer: Haan, aaya tha, abhi abhi baat kiya unse, quotation bhi post kiya maine unko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Through through nahi hua hai.
Executive: To kya bolenge the ye?
Customer: Wo Monday ko koi customer hai unko phone karke mujhe batayega, batane se aapko batayenge bola, aur bhi aaj bhi unka rate kam karke unko WhatsApp me matlab IndiaMART me dala hai rate unko.
Executive: Sir ye jo 5 ton wale hai, actually sir ab dekhiye apna requirement hai ki aapko jyada lagabhag 25 ton, 30 ton aap jo bata rahe the, theek hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: But us type ke customer ko sir aapko engage karne ke liye thoda sa to usme time lagta hai ki jo abhi 5 ton wale aa rahe hai inko aap regular follow karenge to inki requirement bhi sir badh jayegi na.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan, aisa ki matlab inhe aap multiple follow karte rahe, jaise sir abhi inko 5 ton hai, abhi in sab do teen party aur aise aap connect kar lo same location ka, to abhi 5 into 5 into 3 karenge to 15 ton ka ho gaya, theek hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap ek gaadi aise sath me nikal do, to aise aap ek hi location se teen char seller aap pakad lijiye, teen char buyer aap pakad lijiye sir.
Executive: Ab ek gaadi fir aap nikal dijiye, aap 5 ton inke yaha, 5 ton inke yaha, 10 ton inke yaha aise karke aapka pura ek gaadi ban jayega.
Customer: Aur wo bahut hi mushkil hai.
Executive: Mushkil hai sir aise?
Customer: Haan mushkil.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi kya hai ki ab wo ab minimum to jo apna hai exact to sir apna isme maine aapko bataya tha ki jo quantity ka requirement hai wo exact isme bahut rare case me aate hai aur jo buyer hote bhi hai wo direct call ke through connect hote hai oil cake wale me.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan, baki jo apna mattress hai, ye hai wo to apna sir correct ho gaya, pehle to apne paas call vagarah bahut kam aati thi wo cheez to sir apne paas aane laga, hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, pehle jo issue aa raha tha ki apne paas na call aa rahi thi na query aa rahi thi, na bylead show ho raha tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo problem to sir apna sahi ho gaya hai.
Customer: Matlab aage se aur badhana chahiye, abhi abhi sir jyada nahi aa rahe hai, ek do, ek do bas.
Executive: Haan sir, abhi dekhiye kya hai starting hai, aapka catalog abhi around two months hua hai IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na? To aapse pehle bhi jo seller registered hai wo log bhi sir IndiaMART pe apna requirement check karte rehte hai, wo bhi bylead contact by now karte hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, to competition market hai thoda sa, to is vajah se abhi jaise jaise aapka catalog sir old hota jayega, ye aapki visibility bhi increase hogi aur apne paas call aur query ka response aur jyada badhega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Isme jo bhi log mujhe call kar rahe hai wo sabhi log hmm mostly ye, ye, ye apna traders hi kar rahe hai mujhe.
Executive: Haan to sir dekhiye traders hi to matlab as a seller hi to buyer hote hai, trader ke paas to manufacturing nahi hai na, wo aapse purchase karenge tabhi aage sell karenge.
Customer: Sahi hai, lekin trader kya dekhte hai hamesha margin aur kam hona, kyuki sab log ko utna hi margin hota hai.
Executive: As a manufacturer jo price aap denge to as a trader wo bhi to sir aapse ₹2 leke tabhi to aage market me sell karega.
Customer: Haan, haan, aap direct, direct retailer ko aap nahi de payenge na.
Executive: Sahi hai, sir aapko bhi koi cheez ki requirement hoti hogi sir aap bhi to purchase karte honge na kahi se.
Executive: Sahi hai, to as a aap bhi as a aap bhi manufacturer as a matlab raw material aap lete hai to aap bhi to buyer hue, to jo seller hai wo bhi as a buyer IndiaMART pe trade karte hai, to aap agar negotiate karenge to sir cheeze set ho sakti hai aisa nahi aur wo trader sir aapse multiple time aapke connected rahenge.
Customer: Sahi hai, hmm, but unhe regular follow up thoda sa price ko leke sir aapko negotiate to karna padega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir abhi main, abhi abhi ek thoda sa samajh me aa raha hai, bilkul low margin pe kam karta hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm, to wahi thoda sa lag ke sir kam kariyega, main aapko guide to kar raha hu proper, aap dekhte hai na main aapko connect karta rehta hu 10 din, 15 din pe.
Customer: Theek hai, hai na? Haan, okay, to abhi, haan abhi jo bhi requirement aa raha hai, abhi koshish kariye sir baki ye oil cake ke alawa ye curtain ka and aapka bed sheet mattress ka in sab ka bhi requirement aap receive kariye.
Customer: Abhi uska bhi aage set karenge, haan theek hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm, mattress ka bhi try karenge, hmm.
Executive: Haan, abhi sir recent me jaise apne paas aaya hai ek first I want to sample send me photo abhi ye kernel cake aaya hai apna Andhra se, Navdeep, haan.
Customer: Two hours cake wo.
Executive: And 5 ton ka hai aapka Hyderabad se, loose me.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 5 ton hai ye.
Customer: Ye first I want sample ye log sample lete hai, itna sample main bhej raha hu.
Executive: Sample chahiye then fir ye apna quantity vagarah aapke sath share karenge.
Executive: Abhi aap isko contact by now kar lijiye ye wala.
Customer: Contact by, haan.
Customer: Wo ka, wo contact mujhe karega ya main karna hai?
Executive: Sir ye Warangal, Warangal apne paas padta hai.
Customer: Haan, Hyderabad Warangal.
Customer: Haan, wo to Hyderabad ka paas hi hai.
Customer: Ye sir paas hi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Executive: Contact by now kiya sir aapne?
Customer: Haan kiya na.
Executive: Haan sir ye Warangal apne paas me padta hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aapke sir ek requirement hai kal ka palm kernel cake 2 ton hai but buyer is located in Warangal isme likh rakha hai and ek 5 ton ka hai Hyderabad se.
Customer: Accha, are 2 ton ka to nahi kar sakta, apna paas to loose bhi nahi rehta hai.
Executive: Haan 5 ton wala dekh lijiye.
Customer: Apna paas to problem hai ki loose nahi rehta hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Main bhi company wale se puchta hu bhaiya 2 ton, 5 ton aisa koi deta hai kya karke.
Executive: Ek baar contact kar lenge to buyer ka details aapke paas aa jayega na.
Customer: Haan haan wahi to, haan.
Executive: Haan, theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye apne paas requirement sir show ho rahi hai, pehle sir nahi show ho rahi thi.
Customer: Sahi hai.
Executive: Isko daily basis karte rahiye, unke kabhi bhi kuch issue hota hai mera number sir save hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan haan to aap mere ko sir beech me call kar sakte hai aisa koi issue nahi, Monday to Friday sir hum available hote hai.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay, to main aapka concern sir close kar du fir ye video meeting wala bhi ki abhi main.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Theek hai, aapke paas sir ek feedback jayega aapke notification pe, mail pe bhi jayega plus SMS bhi, to usko sir feedback pe sir aap revert kar dijiyega please.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving low quantity buyleads.

- Customer is facing issues with traders.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to engage customers.

- Executive explained the importance of negotiation.

- Executive shared details of recent buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to contact the shared buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, traders, negotiation, mattress, oil cake
